channel.title: airtel on Tech Jaunts
channel.description: Recent content in airtel on Tech Jaunts

item.title: Every coin has two sides. So does Airtel
item.description: I am very disappointed with the service that Airtel Customer care have provided and equally disappointed with the service I have received from their store. They’re literally looting my money and I have to wait for their help because there’s nothing that I can do, other than posting it online. Journey on Pushpak Viman To Postpaid Here’s what I have been through after I thought to move to postpaid. Once I checked Airtel’s website and came to know they have good plans in postpaid with very high data usage which can be used, I tried registering for an airtel postpaid connection online.
